brreg:skjema.brreg:tittel: NF-2007: Accident/Incident/Occurrence reporting in civil aviation

xforms:caption.p: NF-2007 Accident/Incident/Occurrence reporting in civil aviation
NF-2007 Rapportering av ulykker og hendelser i sivil luftfart

xforms:hint.p: Welcome to the incident/accident reporting-form for mandatory reporting to the authorities (Civil Aviation Authority - Norway and Accident Investigation Bureau Norway).

Reporting on this form is restricted to aviation incidents and accidents in accordance with the regulation for civil aviation BSL A 1-3. For definitions regarding classification into Accident, Serious Incident, and Incident, press the questionmark.
Examples of incidents, for which a mandatory report should be filed, are listed for the different reporting groups in appendix to the regulation - press ?Om skjema and follow the links.
Accidents and Serious Incidents are automotically send to both CAA Norway and AIB Norway, whereas other incidents (i.e. not Serious Incidents) will be send to CAA Norway only.
Objective: ?The sole objective of reporting is the prevention of accidents and incidents and not to attribute blame and liability.

Pages 1 (General information) and 9 (Narrative of the incident/accident) are mandatory for all types of reports. Some elements of information are also mandatory, depending on the reporting group and type of report you selected. These elements have to be completed in order to be able to submit the report. Please fill in all the information that you consider relevant for the incident/accident and additional information that can be useful for later statistical application.

Please select from the menu below your reporting group and the type of report you want to submit. Based on these choices, the report will contain certain pages of information that can be relevant for your report. Available pages are listed to the left on the screen. By pressing next you will enter the next available page, until the end of the report. Please fill in all the relevant information.
Dette er spørsmål som vil avklare hvilke deler av skjemaet du skal fylle ut. Velg riktig alternativ for deg og klikk på Neste knappen

xforms:caption.p: Reporting group and type of report

xforms:help.p: Classify into Accident, Serious Incident or Incident. Your classification can be subjected to reclassification at the authorities, based on the information given in this preliminary report or additional information gathered.
Accidents and Serious Incidents will automatically be send directly to Both CAA Norway and Norwegian AIB, whereas Incidents (e.g not serious) go to CAA Norway only.
Appendix 1 to the BSL A 1-3 contains an example list of incidents that always should be classified as Serious Incident.
Apendix 2 ? 7 consist of lists of examples for reportable incidents for the six different reporting groups. Access via ?Om skjema for complete lists.
Definitions (see also reporting regulation BSL A 1-3, link in ?Om skjema)

xforms:caption.p: CFIT- Controlled flight into or towards terrain
RI-VAP- Runway incursion- vehicle, a/c or person

xforms:help.p: This is a test of the sign §.
Dette er en test av tegnet for lovparagraf §.

xforms:caption.p: CFIT- Controlled flight into or towards terrain
RI-VAP- Runway incursion- vehicle, a/c or person
CFIT- Controlled flight into or towards terrain
RI-VAP- Runway incursion- vehicle, a/c or person

xforms:alert.p: Enter positive integer with four digits
Feltet krever positivt heltall med fire siffer
Feltet krev positivt heiltal med fire siffer
Enter positive integer with four digits
Feltet krever positivt heltall med fire siffer
Feltet krev positivt heiltal med fire siffer

xforms:help.p: Choose ?Yes if an aircraft was involved in the incident/accident and enter aircraft registration below. If you dont know if any aircraft was involved, choose ?Unknown.

xforms:caption.p: Occurrence in connection with a flight?

xforms:help.p: Choose ?Yes if the time of incident/accident happened after any person was boarding with intensions of flying and before all persons have left the aircraft after flight.
All four elements belonging to the ?Severity group are mandatory.
Definitions and explanations on the answering options are presented on each of these four elements.

xforms:caption.p: Fuel quantity onboard at time of occurrence
Relativ retning mellom fartøy og bølger
Visning (range) som radaren var innstilt på
Del av luftfartøyet som ble truffet
